title: buy riot poin on ps4
body: i have 100$ on my ps4 and i want bye riot point how i do that

replies.body:
Unfortunately, you cannot buy Riot Points on a PS4. You can purchase them in the game client or through a [**local retailer**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/community/prepaid-cards) near you that carries prepaid RP Cards.

If you have any other questions, let me know!
